historical.title: Historical Results
historical.subtitle: Legacy performance data before the new system
historical.note: The statistics are calculated based on the following: VIP Elite: ‚Ç¨60, Double (VIP Gold): ‚Ç¨50, SBT (VIP Gold): ‚Ç¨20, UFC (VIP Gold): ‚Ç¨20, VIP Silver: ‚Ç¨12, Parlay: ‚Ç¨25, Hard Bets: ‚Ç¨10, and Funbet: ‚Ç¨5. Free UFC and Live bets are NOT included in the statistics.

info.title: INFO
info.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our VIP betting service

sbt.title: What is SBT?
sbt.content: SBT, meaning Sports Betting Trading, is a new category which represents the future of betting. Many of you know what Trading is in general, but it has never existed for Sports Betting.
sbt.content2: We use tools that we built ourselves over the past year with a lot of money and effort. These tools send us signals for LIVE games where there is a very good opportunity to double our money. The selection passes our checks that give us the okay to send it to the VIP.

double.title: What is a Double?
double.content: A double consists of the best and safest selections that we can combine so that the final odds double our money.
double.content2: We usually have 2 doubles per week, one from Monday to Thursday and one from Friday to Sunday.

cashOut.title: What is Cash Out and when do we use it?
cashOut.content: Cash out is an option provided by the betting company where, depending on how well our bet slip is going, they offer us the corresponding amount of money without the game finishing.
cashOut.content2: When I see a game where the result has not taken big dimensions and can ruin our bet slip at any moment, while offering us 95% of our final profit, then I send a signal on Telegram and tell you to Cash Out.

staking.title: Why should we always use same Staking Amount?
staking.content: We must always Same Staking amount based on the percentages we have assigned for each type of bet slip. If someone does not have the financial ability to play with those specific amounts, they can set them themselves new ones by using the same percentages we set for each bet and dividing them so they reach a level that suits them.
staking.content2: After many wins, you should not fall into the trap of increasing the amount you stake. Any increase in staking should be done gradually on a monthly basis.

upgrade.title: How does upgrading and the categories work?
upgrade.content: If someone wants to upgrade from a lower VIP to a higher one, they do not need to pay the full amount, only the difference required to reach the total price of the VIP category they are interested in.
upgrade.content2: The categories funbet, hard bets, parlay, UFC and live belong to the free package and are available to everyone. From these, UFC and live are the only ones that do not count in the statistics.
upgrade.content3: VIP Silver includes games from all countries around the world with our own connections. VIP Gold includes everything in VIP Silver plus the doubles, the UFC VIP where picks are always studied for many hours, and SBT. In the final and best category, VIP Elite, in addition to everything included in the lower VIP packages, we offer games similar to VIP Silver but much stronger and the best on the market. That is why they are offered only in Elite VIP, because the number of people we allow inside is much smaller than in Silver.
